short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all <applet> elements on a page with corresponding <object> elements, keeping all attributes and parameters intact.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple plugin that replaces all <applet> elements on a page with corresponding <object> elements. All attributes are passed from the <applet> to the <object>. All <param>'s are passed on as well.

Rumor has it that Chrome doesn't like applet tags, alts√• it is deprecated according to web standards. This is an easy fix.

The extension only uses native JavaScript.

This extension is especially dedicated to Norwegian banks still using applet tags for loading java applets, making it impossible to use Google Chrome to pay your bills ;-)

Note: Seems to be broken in Chrome 8. Works in Chrome 9 beta v/9.0.597.19
